metadata.title: CVE-2022-3155 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: When saving or opening an email attachment on macOS, Thunderbird did notset attribute com.apple.quarantine on the received file. If the receivedfile was an application and the user attempted to open it, then theapplication was started immediately without asking the user to confirm.This vulnerability affects Thunderbird < 102.3.

criterions.comment: thunderbird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
